body: Can you add tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device_set.h to //tensorflow/core:core_cpu_base and make the cluster lib depend on core_cpu_base instead of core_cpu_lib ? We had some really bad circular dependency issues in the past since core_cpu_lib depends on common_runtime/*, which depends on most of grappler, which now depends on core_cpu_lib which depends on common_runtime/*.
body_html: Can you add tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device_set.h to //tensorflow/core:core_cpu_base and make the cluster lib depend on core_cpu_base instead of core_cpu_lib ? We had some really bad circular dependency issues in the past since core_cpu_lib depends on common_runtime/, which depends on most of grappler, which now depends on core_cpu_lib which depends on common_runtime/.
